action_list.name: action_create

action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.name: action_create

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
growpart:
mode: auto
devices: /
ignore_growroot_disabled: true
write_files:
- path: /etc/cloud/cloud.cfg.d/90_dpkg.cfg
  content: |
    [ None ]
